Key Match Events: Scotland secured a 2-0 win over Gibraltar with goals from Christie (58') and Adams (85')
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland were predicted to win by 75.9% of voters, with 18.5% predicting a Gibraltar win and 5.6% predicting a draw
Gibraltar have conceded 12 goals in 12 games since the start of 2023, and Scotland are likely to find the net multiple times in southern Portugal
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland manager Steve Clarke will be looking for his team to bounce back from a seven-game winless streak and a tally of 19 goals conceded across those seven matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gibraltar have injected fresh blood into their squad by calling up six players without a senior cap, including Chesterfield winger Liam Jessop
Scotland's Lyndon Dykes was stretchered off during training on Friday, and his status for the match is uncertain
Others: The match was played at Estadio Do Algarve, with Scotland winning 2-0
